response.overview: Antonis Dermitzakis, a wealthy businessman, dies leaving a huge inheritance to his niece, Maria Chrysostomidou, a 21-year-old girl who lives in a village, Makrychori. The lawyers of the firm Stamatiou and son encourage the relatives of the deceased to legally claim the property. At the same time, a major newspaper publisher commissions journalist Dimitris Vassiliou to find and write an article about the wealthy heiress. Although he initially tries to avoid it, he finally undertakes the mission...
response.title: Olohryso manouli
